interestingcomments.content: HELP! original image consists of 3 trees but literally 3/4 of the image is glitched out when i try to develop on lightroom. Preview and dragging picture to lightroom displays fine but even on camera raw it becames this glitched mess.

interestingcomments.content:
Lens/ Kit recommendations /!/ Hello Everyone! 

My birthday is approaching and people are asking for gift ideas (aahhhhh)! Are there any bits of kit that people have had good experiences with that you would recommend? I’m looking to take my photography that little bit further... 

I am currently running using a 750D, 18-55mm, 50mm 1.8 and 55-250mm lens’ and heavily considering the 24mm pancake lens. I have a polariser, cleaning kit and tripod. I am looking to develop my photography further. 

Any ideas or questions welcome! :)
